name: The 10th World Congress of Nano S&T -2021
content: Following the great success of the past 9 years, Nano S&T 2021-Macao will be a huge international platform which covers a wide range of topics related to Nano-manufacturing, advanced Nano-materials, Nano-electronics, Nano-medicine and Nano-biotechnology etc. The program highlights some recent breakthrough stories and successes in this particular field. During the conference, you will have the opportunities to share information and the best practices from current research to commercial implementation of new technologies. Meanwhile, Nano S&T 2021-Macao will also include exhibition, business matchup and social activities at The Venetian Macao, which is the Asiaâ€™s leading business, leisure, shopping, and entertainment destination.
